Located 7 km off of the Friendship Hwy. Most travelers skip Shelkar and stay at the hotels near the Shelkar Junction, where the road to town meets the highway. There is no public transportation available.
Petrochina has a filling station at the Junction
Pricey food in the hotels and guesthouses.

value: Zhuang Yuan Sichuan Restaurant on the Highway has a 10 page English menu but is also pricey.
